abstract: Rafael Nadal withdraws from Miami Open tennis tournament because of dizziness during second-round match against Damir Dzumhur; other tournament results noted.

headline.main: Heat in Miami Too Much for Nadal

snippet: Rafael Nadal, dizzy as he struggled to cope with heat and humidity and fearing for his safety, retired from his second-round match at the Miami Open in Key Biscayne, Fla.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal, dizzy as he struggled to cope with heat and humidity and fearing for his safety, retired from his second-round match at the Miami Open in Key Biscayne, Fla.
